abstract: Judge Clifton Newman orders investigation into whether former North Charleston, SC, Police Officer Michael Slager, who is charged with murdering unarmed driver Walter Scott, qualifies for use of taxpayer money to provide his defense.
lead_paragraph: A judge has ordered court officials to investigate whether a former police officer charged with murder in the killing of an unarmed driver is poor enough to get taxpayer money for his defense.

headline.main: South Carolina: Ex-Police Officer Seeking Public Funds for Defense in Murder Trial
headline.print_headline: South Carolina: Ex-police Officer Seeking Public Funds For Defense In Murder Trial

snippet: A judge has ordered court officials to investigate whether a former police officer charged with murder in the killing of an unarmed driver is poor enough to get taxpayer money for his defense.
